text: Edward Ernest "Judge" Reinhold Jr. (born May 21, 1957) is an American actor, singer and filmmaker. He is known for his roles in Ruthless People, Fast Times at Ridgemont High, Gremlins, and Daddy's Dyin': Who's Got the Will?, and both trilogies for Beverly Hills Cop and The Santa Clause.Judge Reinhold Biography from FilmReference.com ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American screenwriters Category:Actors from Wilmington, Delaware Category:Writers from Wilmington, Delaware Category:Singers from Delaware Category:Businesspeople from Wilmington, Delaware
title: Judge Reinhold
